boardgame.name: Dragon Castle
Sárkány Palota
Zamek Smoków
boardgame.description: Dragon Castle is a game freely inspired by Mahjong Solitaire. During your turn, you take a pair of identical tiles from the central _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;castle_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; (known as the Dragon Castle) and place them on your own realm board to build your own castle. From time to time, you may sacrifice these tiles to acquire shrines in their place._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Every time you create a set of tiles of the same kind, you _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;consolidate_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; them, i.e. flip them face down to score points. When you consolidate a set, you may also build shrines on top of the consolidated tiles: Shrines allow you to score more points, but they also limit your building options. You may also take advantage of the available spirit card and its game-changing powers...but this will come at a cost! Finally, don't forget to check the dragon card in play, and to follow the building requirements to score bonus points._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;When the Dragon Castle has been reduced to only one floor, the end of the game is triggered. After one final round, the player with the most points is the lord of the new Dragon Castle_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;hellip;and the winner of the game!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2018 RPC Fantasy Award Board Game Nominee
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Arkham Horror 3E, Dragon Castle, Essen Talk with Calvin Wong - Boards _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Swords #116
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Dragon Castle: The Dice Tower Promo
Dragon Castle: The Look-Out / The Glass Fortress Promo
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Episode 23: The Good Ideas Episode (Featuring Luxor, Reef, Endeavor, Century: Eastern Wonders, Coimbra, Dragon Castle, and more!)
Episode 9 - Sexual Innuendo: The name of my new Worker Placement Game
RDTN Episode 146: History of the World, Dragon Castle, Gorus Maximus
The Game Pit Podcast - Episode 104: Picking Over the Bones with Eleanor
The Game Pit Podcast - Episode 96 - Spiel 2017 Treasure Hunt Part 2
The Good The Board and Collection Comparison Episode 170 How Many Games Do You Need

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Language: ger ita uk Edition Year: 2017 Publisher: Horrible Games Game Condition: Mint Box Condition: Mint Availability: Preorder shipping not before 2017-11-15 ID Gis: 30639 (for reference)

This is a brand new copy, still in shrink, purchased at Essen Spiel. Purchased for someone who is now unable to buy it, hence putting it up for sale. Price = €52,00 = £45.50 = $61.00 (all approx.) I will calculate shipping on request. Note, the game weighs 1,94kg before packaging. US customers only: as an example, shipping to the US is $31.00 so the total price would be $92.00 (approx.)
